title: Highest Energy Use Per Capita
description: In 2022, Qatar had the highest energy use per capita in the world, with 16,683.66 kg of oil equivalent per person.

title: Full Internet Usage Among Males
description: In 2020, 100% of the male population in Qatar used the internet, the highest rate globally.

title: Lowest Household Consumption Expenditure
description: In 2022, household and NPISHs final consumption expenditure in Qatar was only 19.50% of GDP, the lowest in the world.

title: Highest Gross Domestic Savings
description: In 2022, Qatar had the highest gross domestic savings, amounting to 67.63% of GDP.

title: Highest GNI Per Capita
description: In 2023, Qatar had the highest GNI per capita in the world, at $125,240 PPP.

title: Lowest Mortality Rate from Unsafe Water and Sanitation
description: In 2019, Qatar had one of the lowest mortality rates attributed to unsafe water, sanitation, and hygiene, at 0.4 per 100,000 population.

title: Lowest Female Employment in Agriculture
description: In 2023, only 0.01% of female employment in Qatar was in agriculture, the lowest globally.

title: Lowest Unemployment Rate for Males
description: In 2024, Qatar had the lowest male unemployment rate, at just 0.067% of the male labor force.

title: Lowest Age Dependency Ratio
description: In 2023, Qatar had the lowest age dependency ratio, at 20.10% of the working-age population.

title: Lowest Rural Population Percentage
description: In 2023, only 0.65% of Qatar's population lived in rural areas, the lowest percentage worldwide.
